subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Russia beat Macedonia, 63-61, on Sergey Monya’s 3-pointer at the buzzer Monday, winning its group and setting up a quarterfinal with Serbia at the European championship. Macedonia will play host Lithuania.
snippet: Russia beat Macedonia, 63-61, on Sergey Monya’s 3-pointer at the buzzer Monday, winning its group and setting up a quarterfinal with Serbia at the European championship. Macedonia will play host Lithuania.
